arts.ttl: Hoffenheim’s Jacob Bruun Larsen on the verge of joining VfB Stuttgart
arts.sum: Sky Germany reports that Hoffenheim forward Jacob Bruun Larsen is on the verge of joining VfB Stuttgart for the second time in his career. Hoffenheim and Stuttgart are close to agreeing…

arts.ttl: Augsburg to reject second Sevilla offer for Vargas, Kicker reports
arts.sum: Kicker reports that Sevilla have made a second offer for Ruben Vargas, but it's not enough to make Augsburg sell him.

arts.ttl: Report: Stuttgart take interest in former Augsburg flop
arts.sum: Portuguese newspaper "Record" reports that VfB Stuttgart are among the interested parties courting Chelsea defender Renato Veiga.

arts.ttl: Confirmed: Marco John heads back to Fürth on a free
arts.sum: TSG 1899 Hoffenheim have terminated the contract of former German youth international Marco John so as to facilitate a free transfer to SpVgg Greuther Fürth
